Attributes.description: The role of employment relations in enterprise performance. Managing employees under statutory law, collective bargaining, and progressive human resource management. Key issues in forming, developing, and maintaining a work force.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of COMM 192, COMM 292 and either (a) all of ECON 101, ECON 102 or (b) ECON 100.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Wed Fri, Start Time: 13:00, End Time: 14:30, Building: Henry, Room: Angus
